message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you at a special price of $10000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $8000 is my minimum, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9000.  This allows me to make a fair profit, and I believe it's still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you consider that price?
